scenarios.name: Create business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba name = Mark Business Consulting slug = mark-consulting status = active timezone = America/New_York

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_3A1okjq8Qs5aqK0FOfkBopJen2e biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba name = Mark Office slug = mark-office timezone = America/New_York

scenarios.name: Create resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_3A1okp4HYjBCWR1MxiCMo7Vw5tN biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba location_id = loc_3A1okjq8Qs5aqK0FOfkBopJen2e type = host name = Mark Johnson slug = mark-johnson timezone = America/New_York buffer_before_minutes = 15 buffer_after_minutes = 15 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create calendar with variable duration
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_3A1okp7fCkWAYyBGQ85ZPNNXS1r biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba name = Mark Variable Calendar timezone = America/New_York slot_duration_min = 30 slot_interval_min = 30 pre_buffer_min = 15 post_buffer_min = 15 min_advance_booking_hours = 12 max_advance_booking_days = 90 status = active

scenarios.name: Create availability rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba_01 biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba calendar_id = cal_3A1okp7fCkWAYyBGQ85ZPNNXS1r name = Weekday Hours mode = weekly frequency = weekly day_of_week = 1 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 18:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create variable duration offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_3A1oklG3DhgGIx7YaMa13TLaZf5 biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba name = Variable Consultation slug = variable-consultation execution_mode = scheduled status = active is_published = true timezone = America/New_York

scenarios.name: Create variable duration offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba_01 biz_id = biz_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba offer_id = ofr_3A1oklG3DhgGIx7YaMa13TLaZf5 version = 1 status = active duration_mode = variable default_duration_min = 60 min_duration_min = 30 max_duration_min = 240 duration_step_min = 30 base_price_minor = 10000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Check variable duration settings
scenarios.prompt: list offer_versions where id = ov_3A1oknrefAL0nxhFQRb1rjjVuba_01 and duration_mode = variable
